html:
green shell glowing with light
a meat roller in a hot roll
sweet water with caffeine
i can't wake up anymore
when a vehicle stops at a parking lot
and when a mother needs to feed her children
shattered glass shines like diamonds
in bright brilliance of sun rays
constant beep of plastic cards
with silicon chip created
signal blinks via cables
signal pierces the air
good morning you green toad
we constantly meet on the town
i like having sweet water with caffeine
eating up a meat roller in a hot roll
title: Toad
